message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.HC 

The paper proposes a multi-agent spatial-temporal attention model for sensor-based activity recognition. This involves selecting informative modalities and their active periods, and representing activities with collective motions across body parts. This work involves computer vision (cs.CV) for recognizing human activities, machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI) for developing the recognition model, multimedia (cs.MM) for processing multiple modalities, and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) for understanding human activities.
